name: Unity3D Map Transfer
description:
This is a rar/zipped file of a unity3D project file you can extract the file then just import custom package on the unity3D application under the header assets. What this does is it comes with 2 scripts allowing the player to transfer between 2 scenes to any position between those scenes.

Tip: make sure your player object is loaded before or set to dontdestroyonload

this is a free file no support will be given to the file directly how ever a short video tutorial can be made on request the email is given in the script documentation.
